PreceptDef.label: analyze creature
PreceptDef.description:
It is our solemn duty to catalogue and analyze all the incredible genetically modified creatures created by our ancestors.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - All colonists that adopt this precept will get the Analyze creature ability, which allows them to scan animals in the map and add them to a genetic database, receiving bonuses depending on the number of animals scanned. Animals that have been scanned will also receive a bonus to filth rate, caravan riding speed and minimum handling skill needed to tame and train them.
